item.title: 降息刺激增长反弹，新西兰走出衰退

item.title: 巴西将主要利率上调至 14.25%，并预计未来将小幅加息
item.description: 巴西央行在连续第三次会议上将利率上调了整整一个百分点，并表示将在下一次会议上再次上调利率，但幅度较小，因为央行寻求为经济降温，并抑制通胀压力的爆发。【原文：Brazil’s central bank raised its interest rate by a full percentage point for the third straight meeting and indicated that they would deliver another hike of a smaller magnitude at their next gathering, as they seek to cool the economy and tame a burst of inflationary pressure.】

item.title: 奥古斯塔国家公园工人因盗窃美国名人赛纪念品被判入狱
item.description: 奥古斯塔国家高尔夫俱乐部（Augusta National Golf Club）的一名前雇员因盗窃高尔夫大师赛的商品而被判处一年监禁，他在大约 13 年的时间里通过网络将这些商品以数百万美元的价格卖给了网络中间商。【原文：A former employee of the Augusta National Golf Club was sentenced to one year in prison for stealing Masters golf tournament merchandise that he sold online for millions of dollars to online brokers over about 13 years.】

item.title: H&F 选择高盛和摩根士丹利进行 Verisure IPO

item.title: 鲍威尔对经济作出保证，被打压的股票牛市重新跃起
item.description: 经济衰退的几率虽然较高，但并不令人担忧。通胀虽然依然严峻，但并不值得担忧。贸易政策呢？到了明朗的时候就会清楚了。美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔说，简而言之，没有理由对当前的货币政策路径采取任何行动。【原文：Recession odds, while higher, aren’t alarming. Inflation, while still sticky, isn’t worth fretting over. And trade policy? It’ll become clear when it becomes clear. In short, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said, there’s no reason to do anything with the current path of monetary policy.】

item.title: 国会支持米莱伊支持国际货币基金组织阿根廷新协议的法令
item.description: 阿根廷国会下议院支持哈维尔-米莱总统的紧急行政令，支持与国际货币基金组织达成一项新协议，这是一个关键的立法步骤，为正式宣布未来计划的细节扫清了道路。【原文：Argentina’s lower house of Congress upheld President Javier Milei’s emergency executive decree backing a new deal with the International Monetary Fund, a key legislative step that clears the way for a formal announcement on the details of a future program.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚能源部长称富人应偿还电力债务
item.description: 哥伦比亚能源部长埃德温-帕尔马（Edwin Palma）提议，由收入较高的家庭和公司承担政府拖欠电力经销商的债务，这些债务已导致一些电力公司面临停产风险。【原文：Colombia Energy Minister Edwin Palma proposed that higher-income households and companies assume the debt owed by the government to power distributors that has left some utilities at risk of shutting down.】

item.title: 美联储维持利率不变后，美国信贷风险指数进一步回落
item.description: 在美联储官员连续第二次会议维持基准利率不变后，跟踪信贷违约风险的衍生品指数有所回落，股市走高。【原文：Derivative indexes that track credit default risk eased and stocks edged higher after the Federal Reserve officials held the benchmark interest rate steady for a second straight meeting.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）新协议临近，阿根廷经济延续扩张态势
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在2024年底实现了连续第二个季度的经济增长，这提高了他在今年晚些时候举行的中期选举中取得好成绩的可能性，因为市场正在等待与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成新的计划。【原文：President Javier Milei oversaw a second straight quarter of growth in Argentina at the end of 2024, boosting his odds of a strong showing in mid-term elections later this year as markets await a new program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 点阵图解析：了解美联储如何预测
item.description: 几乎可以肯定，这是金融市场上最受密切关注的散点图。自 2012 年 1 月以来，美联储每三个月就会更新一次 "点阵图"，这让分析师们趋之若鹜。"点阵图 "已成为美国中央银行事实上的货币政策预测，不管美联储是否愿意。它也是美联储决策委员会内部不同意见的重要线索来源，尽管它既隐晦又关键。【原文：It’s almost certainly the most closely scrutinized scatter chart in financial markets. Every three months since January 2012, the Federal Reserve has sent analysts scurrying by updating its “dot plot,” which has become the de facto monetary policy forecast of the US central bank — whether the Fed wants it to be or not. It’s also an important source of clues to dissent within the Fed’s policy making committee, even if it can be as cryptic as it is crucial.】

item.title: 南非面临工厂关闭，开始审查钢铁关税
item.description: 南非面临安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）关闭对当地制造业至关重要的两家钢厂的前景，已开始审查金属的进口关税，并提出了保护该行业的其他方法。【原文：South Africa, facing the prospect of ArcelorMittal SA closing two steel mills crucial to the local manufacturing industry, has begun a review of import tariffs on the metals and is proposing other methods of protecting the industry.】

item.title: 美联储就经济增长和通胀发出新呼吁后，国债收复跌幅

item.title: 冰岛央行行长称冰岛贸易可能向有利于欧洲的方向发展
item.description: 冰岛央行行长阿斯盖尔-容松（Asgeir Jonsson）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的贸易战引发担忧之际，作为对美元走软的回应，岛国企业可能会将出口转向欧洲。【原文：Iceland’s central bank Governor Asgeir Jonsson signaled that the island nation’s companies are likely to direct exports toward Europe as a response to a weakening of the US dollar amid worries over President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 阿布扎比成立 250 亿美元美国能源合资企业，为人工智能提供动力

item.title: 在特朗普和美联储的支持之前，市场可能会经历更大幅度的下跌
item.description: 尽管波动率逐步走高，但熊市的迹象并不明显，投资者若想从唐纳德-特朗普或美联储那里获得支持，可能不得不忍受更大幅度的下跌。【原文：While there is little sign yet of a bear market despite a gradual shift higher in volatility, investors looking for support from Donald Trump or the Federal Reserve may have to endure deeper selloffs.】
